titleStmt.title: The second part of the birth and burning of the image called St. Michael, or, A new letter to Mr. Jonathan Saunders, lecturer of All-Saints-Barking being the answer of Mr. Edmund Sherman, late church-warder to a sham libel (without any authors name) called The sham-indictment quashed ...
titleStmt.author: Sherman, Edmund, 17th cent.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Mr. Sherman and published by Richard Janeway,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
